Activity: Check emails and system notifications. Review the overall testing progress for the week and identify any remaining tasks.
Execute any remaining test cases that were not completed earlier in the week. Focus on areas that require further testing or investigation.
Conduct a final round of ad-hoc testing, trying to uncover any remaining bugs or issues. Explore the game with a fresh perspective.

Analyze bug trends and patterns. Identify common bug types or areas of the game that are prone to errors. Discuss these findings with the development team. @LPRO-1 and @LDES-1 I need to discuss the bug trends.
Prepare a comprehensive test summary report for the week. Include the number of test cases executed, the number of bugs found, and the overall quality of the game.
Discuss the test summary report with the producer and lead programmer. Provide recommendations for future testing efforts and areas that require further attention. @PROD-1 Summary Report Discussion
Clean up the test environment. Remove any temporary files or configurations that were created during testing. Prepare the environment for the next round of testing.
Submit the test summary report and any other relevant documentation. Log off the system and prepare for the weekend.
